attributes.action: Stop the slaughter of Whales and Dolphins by the people of the Faroe Islands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over 1000 animals are killed every year by men coming of age in the Faroe Islands.This atrocious slaughter has been practiced since at least the 10th century. Nearly 1,000 are killed annually in the “grindadráp” — whale hunt — typically occurring during summer months. 
It needs to stop, Why are they killing innocent animals for their own gratification?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
